alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 11 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR LILLIE ANDERSON, BLACK, FEMALE, 7 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 02 INCHES, 80 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING PURPLE SHORT-SLEEVE SHIRT, MULTI-COLORED SHORTS, AND FLOWER SANDALS WITH TWO LARGE BRAIDS IN HER HAIR. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR AN UNKNOWN, BLACK, MALE, BLACK HAIR, EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING A BLACK T-SHIRT AND GRAY SWEATPANTS, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING AN UNKNOWN YEAR GRAY 4-DOOR CROSSOVER SUV WITH UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATES. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN ON THE 1100 BLOCK OF WEST KIEST BLVD, DALLAS, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 6 7 1 4 2 6 8. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 6 7 1 4 0 6 5. END OF MESSAGE.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata
